attributes.action: Take steps that prevent the uk becoming immoralised
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: UK was a morally disciplined kingdom and since the revolutionary system of freedom withought limits has occured we are lost our trade values that our commenwealth partners so loved us for instead of promoting our family values we are now on the verge of entering and becoming a society that has no religiously approved moral values in place that protect the mojority of the people whio want to see moral values upheld the prime minister has a deep religious belief and is openly a devote christian but! where is his sense of morality when he guides us into wars we dont need society we dont want and children that dont 'get us' so to speak.....

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
